title: HELP
body: How can i change my email, when I don't have access to my old email?

replies.body:
By submitting a support ticket with [this form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and providing as much information as possible.

Let me know if you have any issues with this.
I need help with that, and do I need my old email if I submit?

Nope, you don't need access to your old email for us to assist you. You can use whatever current email you have access to, just be sure to provide as much information in the fields of the ticket form.
